articles.description: The Durand Cup organising committee has revealed the groups for the upcoming edition of the tournament.
articles.content: The organizers of the 132nd Durand Cup football tournament, set to be played between August 03-September 03, 2023, in the cities of Kolkata, Guwahati and Kokrajhar, today announced the groups for the… [+2884 chars]
